subject: Soccer
Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Ahead of the World Cup finals draw in Cape Town on Friday, Didier Drogba, captain of Ivory Coast, one of Africa's most powerful entrants, sent a double message.
snippet: Ahead of the World Cup finals draw in Cape Town on Friday, Didier Drogba, captain of Ivory Coast, one of Africa's most powerful entrants, sent a double message.
